Package ohos.data.distributed.common

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.distributed.common.Query

  • public class Query
extends Object
    Represents a database query using a predicate.

    This class provides a constructor used to create a Query instance, which is used to query data matching specified conditions in the database.

    This class also provides methods for adding predicates to the Query instance.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR

      Sets a specified index that will be preferentially used for query.

        public Query limit​(int number,
                   int offset)
        Constructs a Query object to specify the number of results and the start position.
        Parameters:
        number - Indicates the number of results.
        offset - Indicates the start position.
        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Since:
        3

      • isNotNull

        public Query isNotNull​(String field)
                throws KvStoreException
        Creates a query condition with a specified field that is not null.
        Parameters:
        field - Indicates the specified field.
        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if field is incorrect.
        Since:
        4

      • beginGroup

        public Query beginGroup​()
        Creates a query condition group with a left bracket.

        Multiple query conditions in an Query object can be grouped. The query conditions in a group can be used as a whole to combine with other query conditions.

        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Since:
        4

      • endGroup

        public Query endGroup​()
        Creates a query condition group with a right bracket.

        Multiple query conditions in an Query object can be grouped. The query conditions in a group can be used as a whole to combine with other query conditions.

        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Since:
        4

      • prefixKey

        public Query prefixKey​(String prefix)
                throws KvStoreException
        Creates a query condition with a specified key prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - Indicates the specified key prefix.
        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if prefix is incorrect.
        Since:
        4

      • setSuggestIndex

        public Query setSuggestIndex​(String index)
        Sets a specified index that will be preferentially used for query.
        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the index to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the Query object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if index is incorrect.
        Since:
